mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (name, email, password, role, addr, postcode, tel, createdAt, projectCount, cart_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{role}, #{addr}, #{postcode}, #{tel}, #{createdAt}, #{projectCount}, #{cart_id})
mapper.select: select DATE(createdAt) As joinDate, Count(id) As memberCount FROM member where createdAt >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 6 DAY group by DATE(createdAt) order by createdAt
